item.title: 算法day01
item.description: 精通一个领域 Chunk it up 拆分知识点 Deliberate Practicing 刻意练习 Feedback 反馈 国外知乎 Reddit Musk it is important to view knowledge as sort of a semantic tree – make sure you understand the fundamental principles, ie the trunk and big branches, before you get into the leaves/details or there is nothing for them to hang on
